job_description:
We are currently seeking a Senior Sitecore Developer to join our team of architects and engineers. We are looking for a software developer who has a strong interest in learning new technologies to join our growing team. You will be working with a team of talented developers, leads, and architects that will provide support as you tackle important problems and resolve complex issues for our clients.

If you thrive in an environment where you are surrounded by motivated, energetic developers and technologists consider this opportunity is for you!

Roles And Responsibilities

Contribute in all phases of the development lifecycle and understand the entire software development process from design to development to deployment to maintenance.
Work with a team to solve problems and deliver project work for our clients
Actively participate in client meetings, professionally and expertly, tailoring communications to fit your audience.
Require minimal supervision, provide oversight for assigned projects, and get things done without being micromanaged.
Work fast with an attention to detail within a fast-paced work environment with hard deadlines.
Write well designed, testable, efficient code.
Work collaboratively with a team in an Agile environment

Preferred Qualifications

Current Sitecore Certification (Sitecore 9.x or 10.x)
7+ years of professional programming experience
5+ years Sitecore development, including building completed Sitecore Experiences from start to finish
Familiarity with the Agile development processes, including the use of coding standards and systems for version control, build, regression testing
Strong communication, problem solving, and consulting skills
Familiarity with modern programming architecture
Actively participated in scalable website and web application development

Nice To Have’s

Hands-on experience designing/developing/consuming APIs

We invite you to subscribe to our monthly and quarterly newsletters to stay up to date with the latest job openings as well as resources and tips for job seekers here .
